column4: I removed and installed Deluge because it was stuck on something, and the GUI changed completely. also the second install required deluge-torrent-common where I only had deluge-torrent before
maybe it had themes installed? or it's a new release
it seems to have gone backwards
the GUI was much sleeker and user-friendly before. it had more options and better precision
Hmm, maybe they changed it in the new version?
Hmm, maybe they changed it in the new version? (that answer was for yeh)
why would they make it worse?
you maybe had themes installed for it?
I don't remember ever installing a theme
One question, did you install it from Manager or from a website?
